QuestData.Title: Beneath the Heart of Fear
QuestData.Description: The Klaxxi have detected the existence of another paragon, Wakener.$B$BThis one was kept well-hidden from us, and for good reason.$B$BThe Empress already has possession of this one, and her adjuncts work to destroy it even now.$B$BThey are performing their sorcery in a chamber deep beneath the palace, and they must be stopped.$B$BWe hold Klaxxi'vess. You must go in our stead. Find the entrance to their chamber from the ledge to the west.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Adjunct Ek'vem, Adjunct Ikkess, Adjunct Suruz, and Adjunct Tsikzi, and then free Xaril the Poisoned Mind.
